name: World Conference on Data Science & Statistics
content: The World Conference on Data Science & Statistics, taking place in Amsterdam, Netherlands from June 17-19, 2024 in-person discussion. With the theme "Data Science in the Age of AI and ChatGPT". The Data Science Week is a three-day event that caters to academics, businesses, and other industries interested in data science, statistics, machine learning, artificial intelligence, big data, data visualization, and related fields. The program will feature plenary talks, keynote speeches, contributed talks, and a poster session covering various topics. There will be multiple sessions available for attendees to participate in. Please note that abstract submissions are now open for Data Science Week 2024 in Amsterdam. If you're interested in giving a talk, please submit your proposal.
